name: Way of the Cobalt Soul
description: Scholarly monks dedicated to unveiling secrets and exploiting foes' weaknesses.

3.name: Extract Aspects
3.description: When you hit with Flurry of Blows, analyze a creature to learn its resistances, vulnerabilities, and immunities, and make reaction attacks when it misses you.

6.name: Extort Truth
6.description: Spend 1 ki point to prevent a struck creature from lying for up to 10 minutes, granting advantage on Charisma checks against it.

6.name: Mystical Erudition
6.description: Gain one language and proficiency with Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, or Religion, or double proficiency if already proficient.

11.name: Mind of Mercury
11.description: Once per turn, spend 1 ki point to take an additional reaction. Only one reaction per triggering effect.

11.name: Mystical Erudition (11th Level)
11.description: Gain another language and another skill proficiency or double proficiency from the same list.

17.name: Debilitating Barrage
17.description: Spend 3 ki points on a hit to give a creature vulnerability to a damage type for 1 minute (or suppress resistance).

17.name: Mystical Erudition (17th Level)
17.description: Gain a third language and skill proficiency or doubled proficiency from the list.
